Class StyleTwo

  • java.lang.Object
    • StyleTwo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MancalaBoardLayout

    public class StyleTwo
extends java.lang.Object
implements MancalaBoardLayout
    Copyright (C) Victory Chang. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. A class that represents one style for the mancala game.
